We'll miss you, Logo. It was great being able to RP with you again.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:  Hey all, I just wanted to publicly appologize to those who 
took 
> offence to my Feline post.  I was just RPGing the char and didn't 
> think anything of it at the time. But, I would like to say "I'm 
> Sorry" to those who didn't appreciate that type of post. I'll not 
> post like that in the future.  Thank you. 
> 
> Logo.
> 
> P.S.  
> I shall be leaving the RPG once again. And this time, I can not say 
> that I'll be back.  I can be reached through my email, but I can not 
> post in the RPG for a while. Due to personal circumstanses, I must 
> leave.  I do beg forgiveness from the RPGers in the group and I hope 
> that one day you will all forgive me. 
> 
> Here is the list of the personel that will recieve my chars. 
> Yanshosh:: Squizzy, GoldenEye, DarkMouse,KitKat3
> 
> Alloran2: Battera, Diamond
> 
> airly2000: Trinity
> 
> Cyberwolf: Ice
> 
> tmrattrap: Feline 
> 
> roborick007: KitKat2
> 
> Please feel free to change or do what ever with them.  I give these 
> chars to you.  If I am ever able to return, I shall develope new 
> chars and play them.  This won't be effective untill Wednesday or 
> Thursday of this week. But I felt that I should forwarn everyone.  
It 
> has been an honor RPGing with all of you. I thank you. 
> 
> Lo
